Clean Skin Add new Makeup submit Add to Calendar Brand Add New Makeup Lipstick Eye Brow Blush Eyeshadow Concealer Product Information: TIPS : ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Why is Cruelty free makeup important? As we know today that more and more makeup brands are producing cruelty makeup. Cruelty free isn\'t just a hashtag or a trend to jump on. It a movement that was first started by Lady Dowding back in 1959 when she introduced "Beauty without cruelty". She persuaded manufacturers to use fake fur instead of real fur. How would you know if your makeup is cruelty free? Here is a quick link to Cruelty Free Kitty They have a list of the most current brands that are Cruelty Free -----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
